explanation: Funds are required for the facilitization of AIM-9X Sidewinder missiles in support of munitions transferred to Ukraine in support of the international effort to counter Russian aggression. This is a congressional special interest item. This is an emergency budget requirement.

Funds are available from the Operation and Maintenance, Defense-Wide, 22/23, appropriation for facilitization and obsolescence efforts to accelerate the production of replacement items for defense articles or commodities under drawdown authority. This is emergency budget funding.
